org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy
Class AeDeploymentProvider

java.lang.Object
  org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.AeAbstractDeploymentProvider
      org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.deploy.AeDeploymentProvider
All Implemented Interfaces:
IAeDeploymentProvider, IAePlanManager
public class AeDeploymentProvider
extends AeAbstractDeploymentProvider

This class manages the deployment plans defined for BPEL processes.
